BrightBlade, Rage

* BrightBlade comes up behind Gangon and looks at the bot in question, it's 
a tall bot with a appearance that didn't seem to threatening. But the sheer 
size of it was enough to make one think twice about attacking it head on, 
she looked more closely and saw that this new bot almost seemed...wild.
BrightBlade shook her head.*

" I haven't a clue. Most be something that Scourge scrounged up from 
somewhere."

* She looked at Scourge and then the new bot, she didn't like the look of 
it.*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage looked up at the huge ship and took a step back, she looked at 
Scourge and then back at the metal thing in front of her.
Suddenly the smell of food came to her sensors and her mouth began to water, 
Rage looked around and finally saw the source of the smell.
Gangon!
She heard her stomach growl and she was dying to just sink her teeth into 
him but then the words of Scourge came into her mind...she was not to attack 
any of the beings in this place.
Rage sighed, there went her dinner plans!*
